website_summaries.verdict: This keyboard truly does it all, from controlling music with convenient control keys to easy password typing and searching on a smart TV.
pros: Users enjoy the changeable  backlight on this device for ease of use
Its lightweight design and plug-and-play setup make this a desirable choice
Conveniently compatible with Windows 2000, XP, Vista, CE, 7, 8, 10, Linux, Android OS, and more
cons: Users must manually turn on the backlight feature after keyboard is turned off

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Reaction time of the touchpad is a bit slow, but you get used to it. Backlight needs to be turned on manually after unit has been shut off. The forward slash (/) is mislabeled as the backslash on my unit. The actual forward slash has the question mark on it, and the backslash key is diagonally down and right from it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bringslid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient keyboard, it pairs to a smart TV very easily, and saves so much time typing passwords or search terms on the included apps.
customer_reviews.author: David FazzariTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Easy to connect. Found it easier to use this remote on my smart tv then the application on my cell. Love the different colors. I found it had a delayed response when I tried to play games with it. Over all... it's worth the price and it make using a smart tv a lot easier. I would by it again for a friend
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I have submitted a video reviewing the T16 mini Wireless Keyboard. It is a great product, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy! Very handy
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our main TV to search shows a lot faster than using the remote. My son used it for Xbox one when searching for shows on Netflix or games titles. It is really a time saver. The instructions are poor English but it pretty much is ready to use after your plug in the USB. Really useful tool to have for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chriss

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a good couch mouse.
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is always lagging and veers off, the radio cannot reach across the room. I do not recommend buying this not any other copies of this design, this design is so awkward to use. Horrible design. Horrible to use. Horrible signal. Paid for a cheap couch mouse and got something not even worth the price, it works but it sucks so bad. Find something else for your couch mouse.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Let me count the ways
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing. I use it a LOT. It gets used with my laptop, which I connect to my big TV, this makes it very convenient to control from the couch. I also use it with my Android box. I also use it with my tablet. I also use it with my Xbox one. I can even use it directly with my smart TV. It is back lit with multiple colors, very nice for using in the dark. Built in battery, like a cell phone battery, lasts for weeks. This is one of those products I use so much I can't imagine being without. If anything ever happens to it I would immediately buy another. Highly recommend thanks
customer_reviews.author: Evel Knievel

customer_reviews.title: Best mini keyboard you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: In less than 5 minutes this little keyboard became an indispensable device for my Android player. I plugged in the USB receiver (My android player is the) The backlight is an awesome feature. The trackpad works flawlessly. Everything about this keyboard is well thought out. It charges quickly, and stays charged (it will go into sleep mode if you forget to turn it off). I can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: 50Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: I would be happy paying fifty dollars for this product. I wish I could use AAA's :( any workarounds anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a productive, well-engineered piece of equipment for $50. I like to use batteries and get more when they die, not quite the recharge type. The AAA slots are literally about 20% longers than AAA batteries. I know how to put AAA batteries in... Were the springs maybe missing on mine? Any feedback? Even given that the batteries didn't work (couldn't even come close to a firm hold I even tried AA and was way off like I thought but I just have never seen such long AAA slots. Well worth 15-20 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Consum33r

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful Product
customer_reviews.text: Thinking this would be a cool small keyboard to replace a remote is what you get from the title and description. I’ve used this only for the purposes of my Samsung smart TV but it doesn’t function as a keyboard (can’t type into any search bar) and can use only the arrows, which is the same as a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I only now just noticed the front slash key is showing as a backslash. So, yes it works, it just looks like your keyboard has 2 choices for a backslash. The fact you can store the dongle inside the unit, as well as remove the rechargable battery is a plus. Replacing said battery(if need be) is extremely easy. I use this at a very short distance to my Windows 7 computer at work, so my testing of it is limited. I can type short emails & navigate around windows apps pretty well. This is a perfect fusion of a video game controller & keyboard. The buttons are a bit stiff for gaming, but turn-based games would work on it.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mini USB Wireless Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: 1st one I received was DOA.... battery would not hold a charge. I reached out to the seller and described the issue and they took care of the problem. The new replacement works like it should. The keyboard is QWERTY and the keys feel good under my fingers. Easy to press. Keyboard is compact in size but still usable with my bigger hands. Wireless range is great. Backlit is big + and easy to operate in a darker room. Tried on about 5 of my USB ported devices so far. All recognized the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This thing has a Nokia standard rechargable battery!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great from fifteen feet to my t.v. and to my surprise it uses a standard Nokia battery you can find for pennies on the dollar online! The aaa slot has no connections so you need the rechargeable but at least they used a standard easy cheap reliable battery. The performancce and response is great I just wish it would remember the color choice after power cycle but it's reliable and the battery lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: i700

customer_reviews.title: Still haven't charged this remote in 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Its unbelievable but I brought this for my wife 4 months ago and she has never charged it once. It's kinda weird but the best thing about this remote is not needing to charge it lol. Only thing I can think of is that my wife doesn't use it for gaming, just for channel surfing and browsing for movies on kodi. Reception is great, once I plugged in the mini reciever into a USB extension cable I had lying around and ran it closer to the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. White

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how well it worked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be able to control my laptop from my bed while I watch things online. I was pleasantly surprised how well the track pad worked and how well the device was responsive. I can type whole conversations if I really desired and it controls very very well. The trackpad requires a little pressure when you use it but it's very responsive from there! Also gotta say that the device sits very nicely in the hands. I wouldn't claim this as a great device for gaming only because I did not run any intensive games. Might just be better for surfing the web and typing
customer_reviews.author: Max Yenk

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: For the first day, it worked. The only feature that wasn't working was the number keys. The following day when I tried to use it, I got nothing when I hit the buttons. The light blinks when I press the keys, but nothing happens on the television. The saddest part is that I live in Guyana and I cant return the product since I used a 3rd party shipper. If they're any troubleshooting steps that I should try, let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Shimuel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it’s described and it works with the PS4 but only to chat on the main screen not in games or a lot of the apps, however is great remote on Amazon Fire TV. Also works on my iPad or iPhone if I wanted to use it but, you have to get the Apple USB Camera Connection Kiti if anyone is wondering. Love the Back lit keyboard and the touchpad. Great Buy at a Great Price!!!! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: bfl2125

customer_reviews.title: Not good for big clumsy hands, like mine.
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying to use this device for several days, thinking it would reduce the clutter in my computer area, but once gain, the best laid plans etc etc. Keyboard is too small for me to handle smoothly, and with my failing eye sight, everything is too hard to see without my glasses. A good keyboard for anyone who is used to gaming control pads, but not for old guys like me. I'll hang on to it, in hope of it being a back-up keyboard, in case my bigger keyboard fails.
customer_reviews.author: a4xlbear

customer_reviews.title: Just So-So
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Very lightweight and the brightness is great. However, half of the buttons just don’t even work, the touchpad doesn’t work, my on/off switch is backwards (when it’s put to on its off and vice versa). I love the size and weight of it and it is great for the PlayStation, but it’s very cheaply made and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little keyboard, but it is frustrating to use sometimes. it always auto shuts off and you have to press extra buttons continue to type after you click outside of the typing area, some of the keys need to push harder than others to be selected and overall it just feels really cheap and the button's action feels like crap overall not too bad if you just need something I am going to be buying something a little bit nicer to keep in my recording studio
customer_reviews.author: jonathan kosyjana

customer_reviews.title: Great way to search Internet and the TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this controller to make it easier to search the internet and control my TV. This has been a great addition and help when I have to type in search words of channel surf. It takes a little while to learn how to use it, you have to know where the two keys are located in order to turn on the key board light, if my wife is a sleep I have to do this in the dark. Maybe glow in the dark keys would be a solution?
customer_reviews.author: D. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: works good, functions as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons HTPC. So he can netflix from the couch. He loves it, works good, functions as advertised. I knocked one star because build quality is super low. It just feels cheap in your hands, like its going to break holding it. The case is thin and flimsy, it creaks and cracks with every touch. But it works! For now at least.... :D For 15 bucks, i don't think you can go wrong. Though it feels like it should be closer to ten bucks max.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of tough to use this keyboard. It misses a lot of key presses and registers a lot of double key presses. Makes entering passwords very difficult/tedious/annoying because you have to really pay attention to make sure exactly 1 character got entered - for most things, it's not terrible, but for passwords that are masked and you can't read what you typed, it's a real PIA.
customer_reviews.author: Jack the Bear

customer_reviews.title: I like this wireless mini keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I like this wireless mini keyboard. Its small and can take anywhere you go to use. very easy to install and use. instructions comes with it. all buttons and touchpad are smooth and works great. once usb plugged in tv, turn on and works right away. i would definitely reccommend this to others who are looking to purchase this ^-^
customer_reviews.author: Keo & Nina

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Hiesen Vizio smart tv but it only work for Opera Internet and I still have to use the tv's remote to get it to search. The finger mouse pad works, not that it matters, but when I try to use the key pad on any of the other apps... it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Use at work
customer_reviews.text: For some of my job, being able to use a keyboard away from a PC where the monitor may be in a completely different spot, or the switch box to change PC's connected to the keyboard and monitor being out. -1 Star due to the dongle inside not being held in place by the clip, and just slides around the inside of the keyboard when its not plugged into a PC
customer_reviews.author: Rocky J. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little keyboard that's cheap as well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it is so handy when going to customers sites. My GF liked it as well and has request one for watching movies off our media PC with. Several people have also been impressed and for the price it's worth it. The touchpad could be a bit bigger bet then the whole thing would be bigger and that kind of defeats the purpose. Also. It as colorful as the older more round ones but it feels more durable. So if get this one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marinenko

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile keyboard/touchpad for devices with a USB port for a 2.4 GHz dongle.
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile keyboard/touchpad for TVs, PCs, and other devices with support for a USB port for 2.4 GHz dongle. It worked on a 2 PC laptops and an LG TV without any problems. Three different colored backlights allow for easy visibility in low light/dark conditions. The device also has game triggers but they were not tested.
customer_reviews.author: Hermes Franqui

customer_reviews.title: A great, compact wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.text: We have a laptop hooked up to our living room tv, enabling us to access the internet, YouTube, etc... Before, in order to control the tv, someone had to sit right next to the laptop and control it with its own mousepad and keyboard. With the help of this wireless keyboard and mouspad, we can now browse from the comfort of our couch. Would highly recommend this product to anyone with a similar computer-tv setup as us.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Trapani

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this item. The directions suck. Different language so cant figure anything out
customer_reviews.author: christopher bedy

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy this brand again
customer_reviews.text: Got the keyboard mainly to use with my Mini M8S Pro. It setup easily and manages all the functions I had hoped for. The only problem is the touchpad. It is so sensitive I can't use it for much. It bounces around and never quite lands where you want it to. Got the sensitivity key stroke adjustment and managed to calm the pointer down a little but still too sensitive. There is no help from the website and there is no help from the unit. The seller sells the unit and the rest is up to you. Fortunately I found a forum to seek advice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong two years later. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Several years later I still regard this item as my best purchase ever made. Absolutely love this thing. Too bad it’s no longer available but there’s a literal clone available by ANEWISH. Same thing just a different name printed on it. Highly recommend for those with a PC that they use as a home theatre device or to watch lots of media on.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about a month
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome the first month i used it despite some mislabeled keys and the back light turning off. I give two stars today because after two months the right click button no long works which is a huge pain. Ill have to buy a different one now.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond S Frank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I had really low expectations, but this is actually awesome! If you use a computer to fuel your TV this is so much better than trying to use a full keyboard and mouse. I don't use it as a game controller, so I can't speak to that, but as a remote with a keyboard, this is great. Great finger tracking. Firmly press the keyboard and remember it has to transmit so about 2-3ms delay.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Only works with Netflix on Smart TVs
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this if you're looking to use it with a smart TV. The only app that will allow the letter buttons to work is Netflix. Will not work for Hulu, Prime, You Tube, Vudu ,etc. The only functions that work for those apps are the arrow keys and enter key - basically the same as the TV remote. Deceitful listing and I can't believe it's an "Amazon Choice".
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I use this with my Raspberry Pi and it's great. I've been using it from about 20-30ft from ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Raspberry Pi and it's great. I've been using it from about 20-30ft from the receiver and never had any lag issues. The only suggestion I have to make it even better than it already is would be to somehow be able to adjust the led brightness. Changing the color is cool but if you could also change the intensity that would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K.

customer_reviews.title: but this little gadget seems to work pretty well. The only issue I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it actually works! I wasn't sure what to expect for the price, but this little gadget seems to work pretty well. The only issue I have is that there's a bit of a learning curve when it comes to using the shift/function keys. It's a very nice alternative to a full keyboard and mouse for devices connected to a TV. Overall, I'm fairly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Another ShopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Got ultimate control for your electronics? I do!
customer_reviews.text: You got anything Bluetooth that you want to type into a TV your phone a laptop your Xbox or Playstation your Roku a fire stick this'll turn all that into a computer with a mouse pad it's the best one year later and still running strong!
customer_reviews.author: KG_KG_69

customer_reviews.title: He loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Got remote for husband's TV and/or his tablet that's also hooked up to the tv. It worked beyond expected. Loves the lighted display so he doesn't have to turn light on to use keyboard. We've had other versions of this but not with the same features. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B. Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for searching and typing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my xbox1 Tuesday it showed up Wednesday typing a breeze I have an aftermarket controller so the official Xbox keybord was a no go but this solved my problem I can communicate in game easily enough and search movies and shows easy too when ever the keybord is on screen this takes place of dashing around the board on screen great buy and the back light is great! It doesn’t light up the touch pad like it looks in some pictures but a great product none the less
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update to (Prior review) Not bad, not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: The people who make this product really do care about customer satisfaction. They were adamant about making sure I got the best experience. I wrote about the battery life and connectivity issues, and they made sure to touch base with me and make sure I got taken care of. I upgraded this products rating because it is a cool thing to have, and every now and again things happen and not everything goes as planned, even in manufacturing facilities. This company, however, made it a point to assist me. I rarely see such good customer service, and for that, I commend them as well. Thank you guys!

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Unable to get it to connect, customer service was un responsive. Not a company we will ever use again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Killer, gotta have item for a pc user.
customer_reviews.text: Killer product, battery life is ridiculously good, I haven’t even charged it yet, been using it right out of the shipping box for a week and a half now. Volume controls! Decent trackpad navigation with l and r keys as left and right click. Keyboard is responsive, keyboard commands work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jones

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard does not work with Samsung Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard did not work for Samsung smart TV. Mouse only. Too bad because it was really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the others!
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard. I use it for my Android TV box (MXQ Pro). I had another brand keyboard and it was constant trouble and never worked right. I love this one. The backlight function comes in so handy at night when I have the lights off in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard. Pros: Simple Convenient Light LEDs are great great for watching shows/movies on your laptop while it's connected to a TV via HDMI Cons: not a good casual gaming controller some functions on the D-pads are annoying slight lag when it goes to sleep mode
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for my smart Tv and it works good, there a small really small delay after you type but really good, every button works great. The back light is strong and useful, battery life is good
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, good quality. I tested it and it works perfectly for me. I used it on my laptop, tablet and Xbox One and it worked perfectly. It has RGB light (Red, Green, Blue). The touchpad is very useful and sensitive, the buttons are very comfortable. The keyboard is light weight and it's shape is very comfortable, it has a good signal reception distance range. You got what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Ok just ok
customer_reviews.text: It works however you do have to use the rechargeable battery that comes with. The option of using AA or AAA is not there. The connections are in the battery compartment however they are spaced to far apart. Back light never worked and there are no instructions on how to turn it on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Sporadic
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Retropie. Not sure why but a few of the keys are sporadic. I use u/h as a/b and it takes a couple clicks to first register every time I use it. Then after it registers it works okay for a while. But sometimes sporadic. Overall pretty cool but not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to work with a Raspberry Pi. I haven't got the Pi set up yet, so I tested it on an iMac. It worked great! I love the trackpad and I'm excited to have this mini keyboard and trackpad all in one! Overall it's really well designed. I love the backlit keys and the ability to change colors. I will definitely buy this again for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: SooperMum

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to type on
customer_reviews.text: Been using for months now and have no issues. I use this thing every single day since I got it and I have yet to charge it. Makes me wonder what type of battery they have in this thing. But works great. I've purchased 2 more since my first one for my parents house and in laws.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash R. Samaroo

customer_reviews.title: Pass - not a tv remote
customer_reviews.text: Does not function with most smart TVs as listed. Functionality is very limited and hardly makes sense to buy for a tv. For example, the home button initiates an obscure application we have never used. Get a remote or a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rozenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Raspberry Pi.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I have it setup for my Raspberry Pi. My only complaint is that some of the buttons have a noisy click sound when you press them. Overall the unit is good. Battery life is excellent. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dude

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Probably 6-8 inches wide which is much smaller than it appeared. I didn't see dimensions noted in the description. Seems to work ok, but it is so small for regular use that I probably own a new paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: It works for my Android Box, almost.  Read on.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Use the "game" buttons to click on an item instead of a tap of double tap. It works well. It will not turn my android box off or on, but it sure makes "typing" a lot easier. Over all, an "air mouse" is of more value to me, but I will keep this item as it does have uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I love it but I have one issue
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I want to give it three or four stars. The issue isn't big but it's super annoying every time I try to lower the volume it requires me leaving the button pressed for about 2 seconds before it registers. If I run into any other issues I'll probably lower the rating but so far so good. May,22,2018
customer_reviews.author: Randy G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to use and hard to see keys without the backlight on. But the HappyGo offered to refund my money without me asking. Fantastic Service!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard replacement for quick easy navigation on my media center
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard replacement for quick easy navigation on my media center. Love the overall design once you get used to it. The backlight is great and the RGB colors are cool. Great little gadget for a living room media center setup.
customer_reviews.author: Super-Grower

customer_reviews.title: Easy hookup
customer_reviews.text: Love this! But doesn't work with an Amazon fire stick. Does work perfectly with any us enabled decide to use it for the Xbox one. Just received it today after processing delays and will update my review once getting used to it more.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is outstanding. I didn't think I would use it as much as I do. I have a PC in the living room and this is way better than having a mouse and keyboard in my lap. I am actually using it to write this review! It is small enough to have in my hands but yet I can easily see each key. I highly recommend this product to people that need a handheld keyboard for their electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Trey A. Stickler

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it for gaming. It works for my Android box and tv. I just wish the instructions were easier to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Skitts

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price works great on my laptop and it’s like having a full laptop with the touchpad on one very light very convenient definitely worth the money great for laying in bed and watching Netflix and stuff
customer_reviews.author: John  keteltas

customer_reviews.title: no range
customer_reviews.text: It works like it supposed to and is a nice controller, but the range is like 4 feet. can not use from sofa. more wasted money on a cheap keyboard. operation range is NOT 25m that is a lie. it's more 3 meters.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Absolutely as bright as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, Absolutely as bright as advertised. Easy to use and touch mouse pad is super responsive. Very long battery life per charge(I've had this approx. 1 month and had to charge once so far as it comes fully charged out of the box.. Would definitely purchase again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not much help with Firestick
customer_reviews.text: If your'e not a gamer, this thing won't help much. It works okay, but I don't use it. I bought it as a recommendation to use with my Firestick instead of using the Firestick remote. I like the remote included with the Firestick better.
customer_reviews.author: L Van Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Not very compatible with XB1
customer_reviews.text: Despite what the description implies, this does NOT have full functionality with Xbox One. Letters on the keyboard works for like searching Netflix, but that's about it. Mouse touchscreen does not work in Edge app, or any other app on XB1 for that matter. Don't waste your money if that's what you're looking for. Just get one of the QWERTY keyboards that attach to the XB1 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not very good sorry lots of little issues add up
customer_reviews.text: Great backlight ,home function never worked,key got stuck alot and battery died quickly,so when my dog chewed it up i was relieved to be rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: It is small
customer_reviews.text: I am glad it has the backlight on board, as it is pretty small. It does what it promised. I would have liked it to be a bit larger in size.
customer_reviews.author: MMc

customer_reviews.title: OK item
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have good instructions; i use it only to type codes and anything I need to type on TV; unfortunately not good to be used as a substitute for TV remote
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid but can't figure how to change color. I guess have to sit down and figure it out. Not so user friendly. Works for what I need for my Sony SmartTv with Amazon firestick.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money but it is small and hard on the fingers
customer_reviews.author: budblitz

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old loves it. Works for Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for his TV, he thinks it's cool because the colors change, and he can type instead of clicking on individual letters/numbers. He owns a Samsung TV
customer_reviews.author: Alpa Chino

customer_reviews.title: Bright Compact Freeing
customer_reviews.text: Very brite backlight all colors. Compact versatile pc phone tv or projector Nice unobtrusive battery saver scheme when using backlight. Great compact wireless keyboard for finger typing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura SN

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.  Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: This remote was a piece of junk. way too small to really do anything with and I couldn't get it to connect to the tv. Total waste that I returned.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to see if I would like something like this than my remote
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if I would like something like this than my remote. It works great and the price was right to try something new. I'm not tech savvy, but I found it easy to use. I also like the backlighting.
customer_reviews.author: tbrackett

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard works well, trackpad is rough
customer_reviews.text: The trackpad is not accurate and jumps around, the keyboard is crisp and smooth, I would disable the trackpad function and use as a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: noahbb89

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: A worth product. It has now become my first choice because of the ease it gives while using . Furthermore plug and play is a boon. The spacing of keys has been done very efficiently . Overall a very good product .
customer_reviews.author: Poojan Bahadur Pradhan

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: love this keyboard... i use it for my firestick, works great, no issues at all with connection or charging, easy to use, love the colors for night time use.. very lightweight ...perfect for firestick control... recommend this and seller to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Jondmon

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This little thing works great, it lights 3 different colors, and it's actually really easy to figure out how to work it, because the instruction manual is pretty comical! I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Some of the features don’t work on the remote at all however it was perfect for my tv. Doesn’t turn the tv on or off and doesn’t work the sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These have worked great for a long time
customer_reviews.text: This works really good, and I just cannot believe how long the charge is.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and flat, great battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts a long time, light up feature is nice, but the button that turns the backlight on should be lit...the only time I need the backlight is when it's dark...so, I'm not sure how I'm supposed to see the TWO buttons that need to be pushed to turn the backlight on...also, was hoping this fit in my hands more like a game controller, but it is very thin and flat.
customer_reviews.author: Caytlyn Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Worked for few months
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for the first few months and then it started to break fast. You get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Good for Netflix as keyboard but nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Mainly works with Netflix as keyboard but nothing much else! Does not offer much control over TV.
customer_reviews.author: WD & Toni Craft

customer_reviews.title: This was a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered is exactly what I got. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: JARED C PAVLAK

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, charge has almost lasted a whole week despite ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, charge has almost lasted multiple weeks with regular use. The touch pad stutters occasionally but the price point is great. Keyboard has a nice tactile bump and auditory click.
customer_reviews.author: Nam Truong

customer_reviews.title: Friendly people to order from.
customer_reviews.text: I have to get a new one. I went to plug it in to charge it and the plug broke off. I got a new one the next day and it has worked flawlessly. They stood behind their product without question. Will order from them again. The battery life is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Every

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Handy and easy to use, nice addition to my set top box. Makes entering passwords so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great small keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This works good but is designed more like a joystick instead of a keyboard. It does have full functionality for both but it is a little difficult to use if you have large hands like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert55

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: it connects super quickly, no need to do anything. It’s handy and useful, especially in the dark given the backlit function. The customer care is very efficient and replies promptly, I asked them for some information and they answered right away and politely. Clever tool that I will surely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Good controller.
customer_reviews.text: It works with my LG OLED tv, but not all of the functions. Good to have for typing searches.
customer_reviews.author: voman1

customer_reviews.title: It's fine if you like the touch pad
customer_reviews.text: It's fine if you like the touch pad. I don't, probably shouldn't have bought it. Only cons i see is the forward and backward slash are marked the same on the key board and only have one shift key on the left side. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and No Easy To Set-up or Use
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating! The instruction booklet is poorly written, confusing and clearly not for the novice, beginner or intermediate audience. Online videos are misleading as to ease of use. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know had to reset backlight to on after turning on
customer_reviews.text: So far so good bought one before this and the buttons are different so getting use to them. But after I turned it off and on thought the backlight died it wasn’t there had to hit the function and the light to turn backlight back on
customer_reviews.author: C. Lisbinski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. I am not using this for gaming but to control media. Looking to use with VR setup.
customer_reviews.author: Old MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and design
customer_reviews.text: This product has a great keyboard layout and solid, lightweight construction. The action on the buttons give a nice click so you know you registered the desired key.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, bought two, considering buying five more just to have for backups but no need as they're really durable so far. Easy to set up, just plug n play for Windows and Linux
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I wo9rk in IT. I've had my share of little pieces of tech but I have to say this one is now a plus in my electronic collection. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dio

customer_reviews.title: One of the bed keyboards I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: I got this item last night...it's awesome. i love the backlit 3 colors. Very bright that even in the dark, you will not have a hard time seeing the keys. definitely recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

It's very easy to see even in dark and you can enjoy movie nights without compromising your comfort. more portable you can grip or handle the Mini practical keyboard with one hand or two, even children will find it very easy to use. quick reaction and stable connection high sensitive smart touchpad and multi-finger design brings you 360-degree flipping experience and ensures accurate manipulation. with 2.4GHz strong and reliable signal connection, you'll never worry about interruption and feel more ease and free as it's operational range reaches up to 10 meters. parameters: ✔number of keys: 74 ✔sleep current: package List: ♥1 x User manual ♥1 x 2.4GHz keyboard ♥1 x USB Charging Cable ♥1 x USB receiver ( in the battery compartment of keyboard ) ☞what are you Still Waiting For? Click “Add to Cart” now & enjoy the awesome keyboard!
feature_bullets: ☛Multifunction and convenient: three-in-one multifunctional Mini keyboard combo with 3-Color backlit makes your life more easier. The Mini Wireless Keyboard has function of wireless keyboard, Touchpad as mouse, multimedia control keys and PC gaming control keys as well as three changeable backlight. You can sit in the sofa and change slides and screen options, write on the screen, emphasize words or objects, browse the internet and play games with pleasure even in dark.

☛Comfortable and great quality: high sensitive smart touchpad and multi-finger design brings you 360-degree flipping experience and ensures accurate manipulation. Comfortable ergonomic design as well as durable imported sweat proof material brings you natural feeling while typing and small bumps are very easy to hold by one hand or two. Built-in durable lithium-ion rechargeable battery can last up to several weeks after fully charged and standby time is super long with auto sleep and wake mode.

☛Easy to carry and easy to use: keyboard with size of your hand is small enough(only 5.8*4.2*0.7 inches) and very lightweight 5.11 ounce). you can take, use and carry around anywhere you go and enjoy your happy time without any constraint. With a USB receiver at the back of keyboard, you can insert it into any USB enable devices then instantly using the keyboard without any additional software, just plug and play.

☛Strong connection and wide compatibility: with 2.4GHz strong and reliable signal connection, you'll never worry about interruption and feel more ease and free as it's operational range reaches up to 25 meters and no direction limit. Widely compatible with any terminal with USB port, HID compatible device, Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows CE, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Linux, Android os(with standard USB interface) and more.

☛Great customer service: rest assured that all Mini Wireless Keyboard have unconditional 30-day money back with No questions asked and are backed by 12-month product warranty(replace or refund) as well as lifetime easy-to-reach technical support.
